PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage)
3. J sc (Short-Circuit Current Density)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. J91 (material name)
2. m-ITIC (material name)
3. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage)
4. J sc (Short-Circuit Current Density)

The entity "PSC" (Photovoltaic Solar Cell) is not a material property, so it has been removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |
| J sc |

These are the two material properties mentioned in the paragraph: Open-Circuit Voltage (V oc) and Short-Circuit Current Density (J sc).
